title: Fuck Her Gently
lyrics:
(D) You don't always (F#m)have to fuck her hard
In (Em)fact, sometimes, that's not (A)right ... to do
(D) Sometimes you gotta (F#m)make some love
(Em) And fuckin give her some (A)smooches too
 
(Bm)Sometimes you got to (G)squeeze
(Bm)Sometimes you got to say (G)please
So-(D)ometimes you got to say (A)hey
 
I'm gonna (D)fuck you .... (F#m)softly
(Em)I'm gonna screw you (A)gently
I'm gonna (D)hump you.... (F#m)sweetly
I'm gonna (Em)ball you ... dis-(A)cretelyyy
 
(Bm) And then you say, (G)hey I brought you flowers
(D) And then you say, (A)wait a minute sally!
(B) I think I got (G)something in my teeth could you (Em)get it out for me?
(A)That's fuckin' teamwork!
 
(D) What's your favorite po(F#m)sish?
(Em)That's cool with me it's not my (A)favorite but I'll do it for (D)you
What's your favorite (F#m)dish?
I'm not gonna (Em)cook it but I'll order it from (A)Zanzibar!
 
And (Bm)then I'm gonna love you com(G)pletely
And (D)then I'll fuckin' fuck you dis(A)cretely
And (Bm)then I'll fuckin bone you com(G)pletely
But (D)then...
I'm gonna (Em)fuck----(A)you----- (C)haaaaa(G)aaaa(D)ard
(Bb7)haaaaaaaaaaaa(C)aaaaaaaaaaaaaa(D)ard!!!! [end]
